issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
*Problem description*

*Console Log*

fields.summary: Android: Cannot launch Emulator with Ti Studio 3.1.0.201304151600
fields.environment: Windows 7, 32bit, Ti Studio 3.1.0.201304151600. Tried with 3.0.2 and 3.1.0 SDKs

comments.body:
Hi Saminathan,

Please can you verify which version of the Android emulator you're trying to run? (Found at Green Arrow -> Run Configurations...)

Please can you attach your Studio log file and diagnostic? (Help -> Studio -> View Log File) and (Help -> Studio -> Run Diagnostic...)

Thanks.

Again Today (2nd time)I have re-installed Ti Studio, Alloy and CLI then restated my system. Now its working. 
So please close this ticket  

Thank You
Saamy
